testcase.name: Login attempt without credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I click the login button...............................................passed Then I should see the error message "Epic sadface: Username is required"....passed

testcase.name: Login attempt with valid username and wrong password
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed Given I enter username "standard_user"......................................passed And I enter password "wrong_password".......................................passed When I click the login button...............................................passed Then I should see the error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service".passed

testcase.name: Login attempt with invalid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed Given I enter username "invalid_user".......................................passed And I enter password "secret_sauce".........................................passed When I click the login button...............................................passed Then I should see the error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service".passed
